maser.utils.cdf.tools module¶

Module providing additional tools for the CDF format handling

maser.utils.cdf.tools.get_cdftype(dtype)[source]¶

Return the id of a pycdf data type, prividing the CDF data type.

maser.utils.cdf.tools.get_cdftypename(dtype=None)[source]¶

Return the CDF type name of a given pycdf cdf type Return the full CDF data type dictionnary if no input argument is provided.

maser.utils.cdf.tools.get_numpttype(dtype=None)[source]¶

Return the numpy data type from a given pycdf data type. Return the full numpy data type dictionnary if no input argument is provided.

maser.utils.cdf.tools.get_vattrs(cdf)[source]¶

Retrieve the list of zVariables attributes from a given pycdf object
